Title: Hands Over the City
Writer: Francesco Rosi (idea), Raffaele La Capria (idea), Francesco Rosi (screenplay), Raffaele La Capria (screenplay), Enzo Provenzale (screenplay), Enzo Forcella (screenplay)
Actors: Rod Steiger, Salvo Randone, Guido Alberti, Marcello Cannavale
Plot: Prior to a city council election, the collapse of a building leaves a land developer and his political backers defending themselves against a scandal.
